item.title: Fuel Jettison System Main Tanks 2 and 3 Jettison/Transfer Valves

remarks.para: May be inoperative secured closed provided associated center wing tank jettison/transfer valve(s) is operative.

note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

placard.para: Placard adjacent to fuel jettison module in the cockpit: "#2 and/or #3 MAIN JETTISON/XFER VLV SECURED CLOSED". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: If verification of fuel jettison valve operation is required, perform the following applicable procedures:

Center jettison/transfer valve operation may be verified by performing fuel jettison transfer valve CMC Ground Test (AMM 28-31-00/501). CMC messages 28649 thru 28652 will identify inoperative jettison/transfer valves.

The applicable main tank 2 and 3 jettison/transfer valve(s) must be secured closed by disconnecting the electrical connector and positioning the manual override lever to the closed position (AMM 28-31-04/401).
